name: xCURRAHEEx 7" "WE STAND STRONG" PRE ORDER
description: straight edge youth crew hailing from manchester, this is their first release after their demo in 2007 5 tracks of fast old school hardcore, melodic at times, bursting with energy, it took some time but it’s finally here TRACK LISTING: 1. CHOOSE YOUR PATH 2. ITS NOT FOR ME 3. MAKE THIS SCENE 4. ANOTHER TRY 5. OUT OF LINE ONLY AVAIABLE ON VINYL FIRST 100 ORDERS GET THE SKY BLUE COLOURED VINYL

name: ANCHOR "LIMITED EDITION Captivity Songs" VINYL
description: 4 TRACK EP, DIFFERENT SONGS THAN EURO RELEASE NEW ARTWORK! UN-STICKERED CLEAR TRANSPARENT VINYL Far Above Captivity It Kills You To Know In The Throes Of Passion Sprung from, and deeply engaged in the independent music community as well as the anarchist and animal liberation-movement of Gothenburg, here’s Sweden’s new hope; ANCHOR! Rising from the ruins of sadly missed bands such as DAMAGE CONTROL and SET MY PATH. Formed, not only to entertain but also to provoke critical thought and inspire action ANCHOR threw themselves into the fray on a 16 day parade through northern europe with Germany’s finest, RITUAL only two months after the bands birth. The music we make can be seen as a natural extension of how all of us are activists in one sense or the other. Be it through playing music, doing fanzines, promoting shows or getting active in local political groups. ANCHOR’s first release, a mcd/7” entitled “Captivity songs” manifests a band with an alarming need, to not only be creative and scream and shout but more importantly also to reach out and communicate ideas and feelings in an adequate way. We feel that very few bands care to do this. All of this together makes ANCHOR a band to be reckoned with for a long time in the future. Reinstate your hearts!

name: HEADFIRST! "sick society" 7"
description: Headfirst! Straight Edge from the South East of England. This band smashes out 10 songs in 8 minutes with no holding back, With lyrics filled with desperation and hate this band get’s their point across exactly. 10 Fast paced songs for fans of Shark Attack & xFilesx. SIDE A 1. Washed Up 2. Empty Words 3. No More 4. Dead-End 5. CCP (Shark Attack Cover) SIDE B 6. What A Joke 7. Wasted Days 8. No Luck 9. Youth Who 10. Sick Society 500 copies pressed on black vinyl artwork by simon edge

name: The War/The Wrath Split CD
description: XTHE WARX is a no compromising, straight edge hardcore band, with aggressive in your face lyrics and beliefs. XTHE WARX is taking standing for straight edge to a whole new level. Hailing from the southern part of Queensland and Byron Bay, XTHE WARX features members from Live Today and Neck Up. If your a fan of bands like Untill The End with the convictions of Earth Crisis check this band out! xThe Warx tracks 1. Ammunition From Inside 2. Carry The Flame 3. Drink Drive and Murder XTHE WRATHX is a straight edge band hailing from San Francisco & Salinas, CA, cities typically identified as hedonistic drug paradises, not your typical breeding ground for a militant straight edge band. The music is heavy and fast, the vocals passionate and pissed, and the band ready to lay waste to anything in their path. xThe Wrathx tracks 1. Fuck Party Girls 2. World Of Pain 3. What We Could Be PRE order Now!! ï¿½5.50 includes paid UK postage

name: JEALOUS 7"
description: Track Listing: 1.CHINASKI 2.HER KISSES DIED LIKE ROSES 3.A FISTFUL OF DEAD ROSES 4.CONVICTIONS 5.BRING OUT YOUR DEAD 5 tracks of blistering, thrashy, straight edge noise from one of the UK’s most promising hardcore bands. With a mix up of melodic breakdowns, frantic vocals and a cacophony of discordant yet catchy riffs: Jealous rip through the boundaries of a tightly constrained genre to produce something altogether fresh and unique. Although lyrically dark and musically chaotic at times there is always a resolution of neatly packed chants for every kid to sing along to. From the hugely poetic screams of Chinaski to the no frills, straight up aggression of Convictions, Jealous show that they are versatile, uncompromising and relentless in playing hardcore their own way.
